item.title: Kerri add a quote by P.C. Cast
item.description: "You know how it is with cats: They don't really have owners, they have staff." -- P.C. Cast

item.title: Kerri add a quote by P.C. Cast
item.description: "Remember, darkness does not always equate to evil, just as light does not always bring good." -- P.C. Cast

item.title: Kerri add a quote by P.C. Cast
Kerri add a quote by P.C. Cast + Kristen Cast
Kerri add a quote by P.C. Cast
item.description: "I stifled a sigh and ignored the Imprinted Drunk Vision Girl." -- P.C. Cast

item.title: Kerri add a quote by P.C. Cast
item.description: "I seek strength, not to be greater than other, but to fight my greatest enemy, the doubts within myself" -- P.C. Cast

item.title: Kerri add a quote by P.C. Cast
item.description: "I've found that the way a person feels about cats-and the way they feel about him or her in return-is usually an excellent gauge by which to measure a person's character" -- P.C. Cast

item.title: Kerri add a quote by P.C. Cast, Kristin Cast
item.description: "As your girlfriend, you've just pissed me off. As your High Priestess, you've just insulted me. And as someone with a working brain, you've made me wonder if you've lost every bit of your sense. (Zoey Redbird)" -- P.C. Cast, Kristin Cast

item.title: Kerri add a quote by P.C. Cast
item.description: "My mama told me don't trust no white boy, even a pretty one. I'm thinkin' a pretty white boy with wings explodin' up from the ground in a mess of blood and ugly-ass bird things is double trouble." - Kramisha (Ch 5)" -- P.C. Cast

item.title: Kerri add a quote by P.C. Cast & Kristin Cast
Kerri add a quote by P.C. Cast and Kristin Cast
item.description: "We stand separate from the world because of our gifts. Never forget that, because you may be sure the world never will." -- P.C. Cast and Kristin Cast
